TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BindingNavigator extends System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip implements class System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize
Public Class BindingNavigator Inherits ToolStrip Implements ISupportInitialize

summary.span: 表示窗体上绑定到数据的控件的导航和操作用户界面 (UI)。

span.span: Represents the navigation and manipulation user interface (UI) for controls on a form that are bound to data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件表示一种标准化的方法导航和处理窗体上的数据。The control represents a standardized way to navigate and manipulate data on a form. 在大多数情况下，与成对控件在窗体上数据记录之间移动并与之交互。In most cases, a is paired with a control to move through data records on a form and interact with them. 在这些情况下，属性设置到关联充当数据源的组件。In these cases, the property is set to the associated component that acts as a data source. 默认情况下，控件的用户界面 (UI) 组成的一系列按钮、 文本框中，和最常见的与数据相关的操作，例如添加数据、 删除数据，以及在数据中导航的静态文本元素。By default, the control's user interface (UI) is composed of a series of buttons, text boxes, and static text elements for most common data-related actions, such as adding data, deleting data, and navigating through data. 每个控件都可以检索或设置通过关联的成员的控件。Each of these controls can be retrieved or set through an associated member of the control. 同样，此外还有一一对应关系中的成员以编程方式执行相同的功能下, 表中所示的类。Likewise, there is also a one-to-one correspondence to members within the class that programmatically perform the same functionality, as shown in the following table. |UI 控件UI Control| 成员 member| 成员 member| |----------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |**首先将移动****Move First**||| |**前移一步****Move Previous**||| |**当前的位置****Current Position**||| |“计数”**Count**||| |**移动下一步****Move Next**||| |**移动最后一个****Move Last**||| |**添加新项****Add New**||| |**删除****Delete**||| 添加控件添加到窗体，如将它绑定到数据源， ，自动将此表中建立关系。Adding a control to a form and binding it to a data source, such as a , will automatically establish the relationships in this table. 你可以使用以下方法之一以自定义此工具栏：You can use one of the following techniques to customize this toolbar: - 创建与构造函数，它接受一个布尔值`addStandardItems`参数，并将此参数设置为`false`。Create the with the constructor, which accepts a Boolean `addStandardItems` parameter, and set this parameter to `false`. 然后添加所需对象添加到集合。Then add the desired objects to the collection. - 如果需要大量的自定义项，或将重复使用的自定义设计，派生的类从，并重写方法用来定义其他或备用标准的项。If a great deal of customization is desired, or the custom design will be reused, derive a class from and override the method to define additional or alternate standard items. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件来浏览数据集。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control to move through a data set. 集合包含在 中，后者使用 组件绑定到 控件。The set is contained in a , which is bound to a control with a component. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataNavigator#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataNavigator/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataNavigator#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataNavigator/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数提供为方便起见，组合创建一个新的各个步骤控件并将其添加到父。This constructor is provided as a convenience, combining the steps of creating a new control and adding it to a parent . 像默认构造函数，它将设置属性`null`，因而不显示标准用户界面。Like the default constructor, it sets the property to `null` and does not show the standard user interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数使用`BindingSource`参数初始化属性。This constructor uses the `BindingSource` parameter to initialize the property. 它还将添加一组标准的导航按钮并设置其对应的属性，如和。It also adds the standard set of navigational buttons and sets their corresponding properties, such as and .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::ToolStripItem ^ AddNewItem { System::Windows::Forms::ToolStripItem ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::ToolStripItem ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置表示“新增”按钮的 。

span.span: Gets or sets the that represents the **Add New** button.
A that represents the **Add New** button for the .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置时，属性生成事件处理程序**添加新**按钮。When set, the property generates the event handler for the **Add New** button. 此事件处理程序调用方法时**添加新**在运行时单击按钮。This event handler calls the method when the **Add New** button is clicked at run time. 此属性是`null`如果以前没有设置和访问之前隐式或显式调用方法。This property is `null` if it was not previously set and it is accessed before the method is implicitly or explicitly called. 控件将禁用**添加新**按钮如果属性是`null`或属性是`false`。The control will disable the **Add New** button if the property is `null` or the property is `false`. 在默认实现中，此属性表示的类型的控件。In the default implementation, this property represents a control of type .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AddStandardItems() cil managed

summary.span: 将一组标准导航项添加到 控件。

span.span: Adds the standard set of navigation items to the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法中添加一组标准的用户界面对象添加到工具条带对于基本导航操作，如**移动第一个**，**移动最后一个**，和**添加新**。The method adds the standard set of user interface objects to the tool strip for basic navigation operations, such as **Move First**, **Move Last**, and **Add New**. 重写在派生类中定义其他或替代工具条带项。Override in derived classes to define additional or alternative tool strip items. 若要确保为您派生的类的最佳设计时支持，请确保每个项具有有意义的值其属性。To ensure optimal design-time support for your derived class, make sure each item has a meaningful value in its property. 在设计时，这将用于生成相应的成员变量的唯一名称。At design time, this will be used to generate a unique name for the corresponding member variable. 项的然后将更新属性以匹配提供给成员变量的名称。The item's property will then be updated to match the name given to the member variable. > [!NOTE] > 此方法不会显式删除任何先前存在的项从，但未设置的新值， ， ， ， ， ，和属性。This method does not explicitly remove any previously existing items from the , but does set new values for the , , , , , , and properties. 此外项在添加时，不会挂起布局。Also does not suspend layout while items are being added.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void BeginInit() cil managed

summary.span: 在初始化组件的过程中禁用对 的 控件的更新。

span.span: Disables updates to the controls of the during the component's initialization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和方法允许控件来优化对多个属性的更改。The and methods allow the control to optimize changes to multiple properties. 使用这两个方法，你可以初始化相互依赖的属性或批处理在设计时设置多个属性。Using this pair of methods, you can initialize co-dependent properties or batch set multiple properties at design time. 调用方法用信号通知控件初始化即将开始; 调用方法来初始化已完成。Call the method to signal the control that initialization is starting; call the method to signal that initialization is complete.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::BindingSource ^ BindingSource { System::Windows::Forms::BindingSource ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::BindingSource ^ value); };

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性表示数据源其中导航以便。The property represents the data source that the navigates through. 更具体地说，属性表示实际数据列表。More specifically, the property of the represents the actual data list. 这是默认属性类。This is the default property for the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件来浏览数据集。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control to move through a data set. 集合包含在 中，后者使用 组件绑定到 控件。The set is contained in a , which is bound to a control with a component. 此代码示例摘自[如何： 移动通过数据集使用 Windows 窗体 BindingNavigator 控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/move-through-a-dataset-with-wf-bindingnavigator-control.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Move Through a DataSet with the Windows Forms BindingNavigator Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/move-through-a-dataset-with-wf-bindingnavigator-control.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataNavigator#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataNavigator/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataNavigator#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataNavigator/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置时，此属性生成事件处理程序**删除**按钮。When set, this property generates the event handler for the **Delete** button. 此事件处理程序调用方法时**删除**在运行时单击按钮。This event handler calls the method when the **Delete** button is clicked at run time. 此属性是`null`如果以前没有设置和访问之前隐式或显式调用方法。This property is `null` if it was not previously set and it is accessed before the method is implicitly or explicitly called. 控件将禁用**删除**在运行时出现以下情况下的按钮：属性是`null`、属性为 0，或属性是`false`.The control will disable the **Delete** button under the following run-time circumstances: the property is `null`, the property is 0, or the property is `false`. 在默认实现中，此属性表示的类型的控件。In the default implementation, this property represents a control of type .

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法称为由公共`Dispose`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the method. `Dispose` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当`disposing`参数为 true 时，此方法释放由任何托管对象持有的全部资源此引用。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 在重写请注意不要引用已释放的以前调用中的对象。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关详细信息和，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnRefreshItems() cil managed

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除了引发相应事件，方法执行以下操作针对的关联状态。In addition to raising the corresponding event, the method performs the following operations against the state of the associated . - 设置使用当前的内部成员状态。Sets the internal members using the current state. - 启用或禁用当前为适当的用户界面 (UI) 项目状态。Enables or disables user interface (UI) items appropriately for the current state. - 更新和控件。Updates the and controls. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::ToolStripItem ^ PositionItem { System::Windows::Forms::ToolStripItem ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::ToolStripItem ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 ，它显示 中的当前位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the that displays the current position within the .
The that displays the current position.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在默认实现中，属性属于类型。In the default implementation, the property is of type . 此属性是`null`如果以前没有设置和访问之前隐式或显式调用方法。This property is `null` if it was not previously set and it is accessed before the method is implicitly or explicitly called. 通过获取当前位置计算属性，并添加 1 转换到 1 基于计数的位置。The current position calculated by obtaining the property of the , and adding 1 to transform the position into a 1-based count. 在默认实现中，此属性表示的类型的控件。In the default implementation, this property represents a control of type .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event RefreshItems As EventHandler

summary.span: 在需要刷新导航用户界面 (UI) 的状态以反映基础数据的当前状态时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the state of the navigational user interface (UI) needs to be refreshed to reflect the current state of the underlying data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件发出信号表示导航的 UI需要更新以反映关联的当前状态。The event signals that the navigational UI of the needs to be updated to reflect the current state of the associated . 这是 类的默认事件。This is the default event for the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`BindingNavigator1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `BindingNavigator1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#124](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#124)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#124](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#124)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void RefreshItemsCore() cil managed

summary.span: 刷新标准项的状态以反映数据的当前状态。

span.span: Refreshes the state of the standard items to reflect the current state of the data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你已重写应在派生类中，你还重写刷新已添加到任何自定义标准项控件。If you have overridden in a derived class, you should also override to refresh any custom standard items you have added to the control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool Validate() cil managed

summary.span: 导致进行窗体验证并返回指示验证是否成功的信息。

span.span: Causes form validation to occur and returns whether validation was successful.

returns.span: 如果验证成功并且焦点可移动到 上，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if validation was successful and focus can shift to the ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法以确认在执行上的项的单击操作之前可以上移焦点控件。Use this method to confirm focus can shift before performing the click action for an item on the control.
